item.description: The Karnataka Fisheries Development Corporation (KFDC) is planning to set up 20 fish markets in the rural areas of coastal Karnataka. Speaking on the sidelines of a programme to inaugurat...

item.title: Food Ministry in favour of 7.5% import duty on pulses
item.description: The Food Ministry is in favour of a 7.5 per cent import duty on pulses against 10 per cent suggested by the Commission for Agriculture Costs and Prices (CACP) to boost the domestic production. </p...
